mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno ORDER BY boardno DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) BOARD WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
